languages.text: "И правда не стоит. Эта бездна с удовольствием поглощает как жалкую чернь, так и холеных аристократов — а особенно ей по вкусу наивные идеалисты". {n}Идира горько улыбается Эвейну и переводит взгляд на останки его бывшего друга.{/n}

"You've got that right. That abyss happily swallows up wretched commoners and polished aristocrats alike — and it likes naive idealists best of all." {n}Idira smiles bitterly at Evayne before turning her gaze to the remains of his former friend.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И правда не стоит. Эта бездна с удовольствием поглощает как жалкую чернь, так и холеных аристократов — а особенно ей по вкусу наивные идеалисты". {n}Идира горько улыбается Эвейну и переводит взгляд на останки его бывшего друга.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You've got that right. That abyss happily swallows up wretched commoners and polished aristocrats alike — and it likes naive idealists best of all." {n}Idira smiles bitterly at Evayne before turning her gaze to the remains of his former friend.{/n}

"You've got that right. That abyss happily swallows up wretched commoners and polished aristocrats alike — and it likes naive idealists best of all." {n}Idira smiles bitterly at Evayne before turning her gaze to the remains of his former friend.{/n}

"You've got that right. That abyss happily swallows up wretched commoners and polished aristocrats alike — and it likes naive idealists best of all." {n}Idira smiles bitterly at Evayne before turning her gaze to the remains of his former friend.{/n}

"You've got that right. That abyss happily swallows up wretched commoners and polished aristocrats alike — and it likes naive idealists best of all." {n}Idira smiles bitterly at Evayne before turning her gaze to the remains of his former friend.{/n}

languages.text: “你说得没错，那个深渊既吞噬了可怜的平民，也吞噬了光鲜的贵族。它最喜欢天真的理想主义者。”{n}伊迪拉对艾维尼苦笑着，随后将目光转向典狱长的尸体，这个人曾是艾维尼的好友。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You've got that right. That abyss happily swallows up wretched commoners and polished aristocrats alike — and it likes naive idealists best of all." {n}Idira smiles bitterly at Evayne before turning her gaze to the remains of his former friend.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你说得没错，那个深渊既吞噬了可怜的平民，也吞噬了光鲜的贵族。它最喜欢天真的理想主义者。”{n}伊迪拉对艾维尼苦笑着，随后将目光转向典狱长的尸体，这个人曾是艾维尼的好友。{/n}

languages.text: « Exactement. Cet abysse dévore les gens du commun et les aristocrates sans distinction... et les idéalistes font un casse-croûte de choix. » {n}Idira adresse un sourire amer à Evayne avant de tourner le regard vers son ami.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You've got that right. That abyss happily swallows up wretched commoners and polished aristocrats alike — and it likes naive idealists best of all." {n}Idira smiles bitterly at Evayne before turning her gaze to the remains of his former friend.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Exactement. Cet abysse dévore les gens du commun et les aristocrates sans distinction... et les idéalistes font un casse-croûte de choix. » {n}Idira adresse un sourire amer à Evayne avant de tourner le regard vers son ami.{/n}

languages.text: «En eso tiene razón. Ese abismo devora a los plebeyos más desdichados y a los aristócratas más refinados por igual... y su presa favorita son los idealistas ingenuos». {n}Idira sonríe amargamente a Evayne antes de dirigir su mirada a los restos de su amigo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You've got that right. That abyss happily swallows up wretched commoners and polished aristocrats alike — and it likes naive idealists best of all." {n}Idira smiles bitterly at Evayne before turning her gaze to the remains of his former friend.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «En eso tiene razón. Ese abismo devora a los plebeyos más desdichados y a los aristócratas más refinados por igual... y su presa favorita son los idealistas ingenuos». {n}Idira sonríe amargamente a Evayne antes de dirigir su mirada a los restos de su amigo.{/n}

languages.text: 「その通りよ。深淵は、哀れな平民も洗練された貴族も、同じように喜んで飲み込むから。しかも、世間知らずの理想主義者が特に大好物なのよね」{n}イディラはエヴァインに向けて苦笑いを浮かべ、彼の旧友の亡骸に視線を落とした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You've got that right. That abyss happily swallows up wretched commoners and polished aristocrats alike — and it likes naive idealists best of all." {n}Idira smiles bitterly at Evayne before turning her gaze to the remains of his former friend.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「その通り。その深淵は、哀れな平民も洗練された貴族も、同様に喜んで飲み込む。特に、世間知らずの理想主義者が大好物」 {n}イディラはエヴァインに向けて苦笑いを浮かべ、かつての友人の亡骸に視線を落とした。{/n}
「その通りよ。深淵は、哀れな平民も洗練された貴族も、同じように喜んで飲み込むから。しかも、世間知らずの理想主義者が特に大好物なのよね」{n}イディラはエヴァインに向けて苦笑いを浮かべ、彼の旧友の亡骸に視線を落とした。{/n}

languages.text: "Ab habt Ihr recht. Dieser Abgrund schluckt jämmerliche Pöbel ebenso gern wie feinsten Hochadel — und naive Idealisten mag er am liebsten." {n}Idira lächelt Evayne verbittert an, ehe sie ihren Blick auf die Überreste seines ehemaligen Freundes richtet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You've got that right. That abyss happily swallows up wretched commoners and polished aristocrats alike — and it likes naive idealists best of all." {n}Idira smiles bitterly at Evayne before turning her gaze to the remains of his former friend.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ab habt Ihr recht. Dieser Abgrund schluckt jämmerliche Pöbel ebenso gern wie feinsten Hochadel — und naive Idealisten mag er am liebsten." {n}Idira lächelt Evayne verbittert an, ehe sie ihren Blick auf die Überreste seines ehemaligen Freundes richtet.{/n}

languages.text: "Çok doğru söylediniz. Sefil avamı da gösterişli aristokratları da seve seve yutan bir uçurumdur orası. En çok da naif idealistleri sever." {n}İdira, Evayne'e acı acı gülümsüyor ve gözlerini adamın eski dostunun cesedine çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You've got that right. That abyss happily swallows up wretched commoners and polished aristocrats alike — and it likes naive idealists best of all." {n}Idira smiles bitterly at Evayne before turning her gaze to the remains of his former friend.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Çok doğru söylediniz. Sefil avamı da gösterişli aristokratları da seve seve yutan bir uçurumdur orası. En çok da naif idealistleri sever." {n}İdira, Evayne'e acı acı gülümsüyor ve gözlerini adamın eski dostunun cesedine çeviriyor.{/n}
